channel.title: Mobile on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: HOW TO: View your WordPress Website on iPhone or Android Mobiles
item.description: WordPress is a very comprehensive all-round tool for websites - and its not just for blogs.

item.title: App Design: Google+ updates app for iOS - result is impressive
item.description: Google+ has updated it’s app for iPhones - Even though the app is not universal - you can see Google+ has high-res / retina display assets and so it renders quite ‘crisp’ even at 2x zoom on the iPad.

item.title: Get Results from an Android Mobile Marketing Strategy
item.description: Android Mobiles are taking over the world - and that seems to be supported by the latest statistics or _trends.

item.title: Mobile Usage and Trends - Updated with UK Statistics
item.description: Good mobile insights and statistics are hard to find unless you pay for them … that’s why I’ve just updated my Key Trends and Usage Insights to include data for the UK.

item.title: Mobile Internet testing tools to check your WP TouchPro changes
item.description: WordPress makes it easy to publish your site for mobile users.

item.title: Remember your Mobile Browser detection for iPad - Smartphones
item.description: So you’ve built a great website for your clients and they’re happy to see its getting lots of good traffic.

item.title: Members Get it Free - Definitive Guide to Foursquare for 2011
item.description: The Definitive Guide to Foursquare has been updated for 2011 - and will be sent out this week.

item.title: Redmine for Issues - Bug track - things I learned
item.description: Redmine is described as a flexible project management web application SaaS.

item.title: HOW-TO Get started with mobile app testing - device checklist
item.description: Do you do mobile app testing? Then maybe you need a getting started checklist to help you with your device settings.

item.title: Gartner predicts App Store Revenue Forecast to Surpass $15 Billion in 2011
item.description: I’ve been on the lookout for this prediction - in 2010 Gartner predicted Worldwide Mobile App Revenues of xx Billion - for 2011 the prediction is for this to exceed $15 billion

item.title: Foursquare most popular location checkin game in London
item.description: Foursquare is still the UK’s most popular location based check-in game to play on your mobile.

item.title: Why Mobile? Why Now? – short guide to mobile marketing
item.description: A short guide to mobile marketing is as short as it can get - and provides just enough insights, trends and key facts to help make the most of mobile marketing.

item.title: b2b Marketing - how to increase your content sales and improve your content
item.description: A short guide with b2b marketing tips for improving your content sales and improve your content using mmCHANNEL’s new API.

item.title: NewsRob best Android application for Google Reader
item.description: Newsrob is my favourite application for Android mobiles, it’s been covered in my 10Best Android Apps** list a few times.

item.title: How to make mobile part of your marketing strategy
item.description: Should you be worried that you don’t have an iPhone app?

item.title: Sony Ericsson's first Android phone
item.description: Sony Ericsson delivered a blow to Microsoft on Tuesday when it unveiled its latest Xperia handset, which unlike its Windows-powered predecessors is based on Google’s Android operating system.

item.title: Does building an iPhone App make cents? sense?
item.description: With the boom in the number of apps in the App Store (over 100,000) and total downloads in excess of 2bn - someone has got to be making money - right?

item.title: App of the day: Balsamiq - wireframing and user experience design
item.description: Balsamiq - I love it - the fonts and stuff can seem a bit cheesy - but I’ve take to this like a duck to water.

item.title: 3 rewards customers who get customers
item.description: From today 3 UK will reward customers with cashback for referrals.

item.title: New UK MVNO before Christmas - Giffgaff to offer free calls
item.description: Name: Giffgaff MNO: O2 A SIM-only MVNO offering cheaper calls to its most active subscribers is to launch in the UK before Christmas.

item.title: Content Providers & Digital New Media Players
item.description: Content Providers, Content Partners, Service Providers or Content Delivery - there is a long list of terms that you can be searching for on the internet to get you a list - but is there a consolidated list of whos who in the industry?

item.title: Blow out the candles - Happy 1st Birthday Apple Apps Store
item.description: So its Happy Birthday to Apple and its App Store - 1 year old.

item.title: Sony Ericsson does chunky retro Walkman W902
item.description: Ive had a look at the Sony Ericsson new Walkman W902 with retro chunky buttons much like a those on a casette walkman.
